ing: 2 fluid ounces passion fruit flavored syrup
des: "This is the Classic N'awlins Hurricane. Drink through a straw from the bottom first.  It starts out calm, but it gets stormy towards the end!"
ins: In a shaker, combine ice, light rum, passion fruit syrup, lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage and lime juice. Shake well and pour mixture into a Hurricane or other large specialty glass. Float the 151 proof rum on top of the drink.
